00010 /* alignment */
00011 enum { NR_ALIGN_BASE = 3 }; /* 8 bytes alignment */
00012 enum { NR_ALIGN_BYTES = 8 };
00013 #define ALIGN(x) ((x + NR_ALIGN_BYTES - 1) & ~(NR_ALIGN_BYTES - 1))
00014 #if 0
00015 #define ALIGN(x) (((((x) - 1) >> ALIGN_BASE) + 1) << ALIGN_BASE)
00016 #endif
00017 
00018 /* hide internal data structures */
00019 #define EXTERN_TYPE(type) typedef struct type##_struct *type
00020 #define CONST_TYPE(type, const_type) \
00021     typedef struct type##_struct const * const const_type
00022

00026 #else

00028 #endif
